mapper.select:
SELECT revNo, userNo, prdNo, odNo, revRank, revStar, revImg, revGood, revBad, revDate, revTrustScore, revTrustRank, userName, likeCount, photoCount FROM ( SELECT r.revNo, r.userNo, r.prdNo, r.odNo, r.revRank, r.revStar, r.revImg, r.revGood, r.revBad, r.revDate, r.revTrustScore, r.revTrustRank, u.userName, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_UPDOWN ud WHERE ud.revNo = r.revNo ) AS likeCount, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_IMAGE ri WHERE ri.revNo = r.revNo ) AS photoCount FROM REVIEW r LEFT JOIN USERS u ON r.userNo = u.userNo WHERE r.prdNo = #{prdNo} ORDER BY
likeCount DESC, r.revDate DESC
r.revStar DESC, r.revDate DESC
r.revDate DESC
r.revTrustScore DESC, r.revDate DESC
) OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (userNo, prdNo, odNo, revRank, revStar, revImg, revGood, revBad) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{prdNo}, #{odNo}, #{revRank}, #{revStar}, #{revImg}, #{revGood}, #{revBad})
mapper.select: SELECT r.revNo, r.userNo, r.prdNo, r.odNo, r.revRank, r.revStar, r.revImg, r.revGood, r.revBad, r.revDate, r.revTrustScore, r.revTrustRank, u.userName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_UPDOWN ud WHERE ud.revNo = r.revNo) AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_IMAGE ri WHERE ri.revNo = r.revNo) AS photoCount FROM REVIEW r LEFT JOIN USERS u ON r.userNo = u.userNo WHERE r.revNo = #{revNo}
